patthana23.24:4.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.24:5.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.24:6.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.24:6.3: Hetuyā satta, adhipatiyā satta … pe … avigate satta.
